thread.title: Rita Ora and Marge Simpson top the Pollpic polls
thread.title_full: Rita Ora and Marge Simpson top the Pollpic polls

author: prbuzz.com
title: Rita Ora and Marge Simpson top the Pollpic polls
text:
Since its launch earlier this year, Pollpic is fast becoming the ‘go to’ app for opinions. With a huge selection of image based polls to vote on – created by users, celebs and brands – sharing one’s opinion could not be simpler or more engaging.
Recent Pollpic polls reveal that Rita Ora is their favourite X Factor Judge 2015 and 60% of voters prefer Jay-Z to Nas as ‘Best Rapper Alive’.
For Pollpic’s TV fans, ‘Storage Hunters’ outweighed ‘Storage Wars’ by a whopping 81% and the app’s users also voted Borat funnier than Mr. Bean.
In a poll to discover ‘Best Cartoon Mum’, Marge Simpson wiped the floor with Lois from Family Guy.
Pollpic polls can be created in a few fast clicks and can seamlessly be shared through Facebook and Twitter, with votes are summarized instantly as a percentage. Polls can also be embedded into blogs or websites.
The potential with Pollpic is exponential; users can feed back opinions directly to celebs or brands and have a real influence on decision making, the visual nature of the poll means that the app is engaging and playful and popular polls will trend live.
Pollpic is currently available free for iPhone and Android phones in the Appstore and Playstore.
*all stats based on recent Pollpic polls, voted for by the app’s users. Poll images and full stats on request.
Find out more at www.pollpic.com
AppStore Link http://apple.co/1UnpwIX
